1.content:
It is a warm summer day, you are Steve, 19 years old, and in your last year of school. Your best friend is named Tom, who you also go to school with. He is of your age and has a brother, Josh, who just turned 16. Tom really is a good guy and you come along with him pretty well, but you can not stand his brother and often you ask yourself how brothers could be so different. Tom is a nice, gentle guy who is friendly to everybody he knows, while Josh behaves like a selfish, arrogant prick that likes picking on people whenever he feals like it and, having his looks and knowing it, is popular with the girls, who seem to find his toughness attractive. Often Tom would stand up for people Josh is picking on, and they would have quarrels. When you see this, you frequently think Josh is an idiot, that needs to be tought a lesson.

Now, it is a friday after school, Tom is sick, and as you leave the school you see his brother waiting for you in front of the gate. 'Hey Steve', he sais. You kind of didn't like the idea, that he wants to talk to you and don't stop your walk, while saying 'Sorry Josh, no time. A friend of my is gonna visit me at my place in a few minutes.', but he follows you and sais 'That's no problem, I'm not gonna stay at your place for long.'. As you look at him a little puzzled he kind of grins and explains 'You know my brother is sick, and he asked me to go over to your place and borrow a book of yours for a homework he has to write.'. 'Which one?' You ask. 'That one about great britain and world war two.' 'OK, come with me, I'll give it to you' You say, as you know Tom writes a paper on Winston Churchill and you have at least two books that partly cover the topic.

On the ten minutes walk to your parents house you don't talk a word. You kind of feel uncomfortable having this bully, who you despise with all your senses at your home, and you know exactly that he also despises you, because you are not a mindless self-centered idiot like himself. That you just lied to him about a friend coming for a visit, and the fact that you parents aren't at home doesn't help to make you feel better either, but not helping Tom iss not an option. As he walks next to you, you can not help but recognize the shape of his body. He does not have giant weight-lifter muscles, but is of average height just like you, maybe 1.80, slim and athletic with broad sholders, well defined muscles on arms and legs and, as far as you can see from a glimpse, also on his chest. A functional, energetic, young body, you think. Tanned skin, curly, brown hair and dark eyes. You can understand why he the girls like his appearance. As it is a hot summer day, he is barefoot and weared flip-flops, and you realize that he hobbles a little bit while walking.

'OK, here we are. Wait a second, I'll go upstairs and look for the book.' you say. You figure, that letting him wait outside is the first step for getting rid of him as quickly as possible, but he makes clear that it wouldn't work out. 'Aaw man, can't you let me in for just a second? I hurt my ankle yesterday playing basketball and it would be great to sit down for a second.'

Even that pathetic victory didn't last even a minute. As you bring yourself to kneel before this ruthless bully. "Good boy" he taunts, with a chuckle. Trying to rise above it, you bring yourself to remove his flip-flops. Hitting a wall of stink from his feet causes you leap backwards. "Oh, don't be such a pussy. Sure it smells bad, just get used to it." You bring yourself closer and getting to rubbing his damp, sweaty feet. Starting with the left one. You feel him staring at you the intensity of his gaze his burning through you. You try to ignore it by focusing on his feet. Anything about them, the way they look, the way they feel even the way they smell. Humiliating as it's less so than having to look Josh in the eye whilst performing this task.

"Next." He says. After 10 minutes of serving his left foot. Stretching out he softly slaps you with his right foot. Waking you from your focus on his feet. You find yourself stunned once more, unable to find the words to call him out on touching your face with his disgusting foot. He laughs once more your motionless face, mouth slightly a gap. Slapping you again, harder this time. "Come on, next." Josh repeats. This time you obey his command. If you somehow hadn't gone red in the face from embarrassment before and you are now. He won't stop pushing to see how far you'll bend for him. You draw the line after the foot rub. You tell yourself, then he goes.

"Stevie, man. We should do this more often." Josh said, offhandedly. "I thought we agreed you'd stop calling me that." I coldly replied. Proud I'd found my words. "Oh, gimme a break. I'll call you what a want." Unable to think of a reply and remain silent. After a moment a stop massaging his foot. "I didn't tell you to stop." Josh tells me, slightly rising his voice. As he flicks on the sports channel on the TV, putting the remote on the table. I remain still for only a fraction of a second before I return to rubbing my enemy's foot. "Good boy" I get once more, as a response. "As I was saying we should do this more often, where are your parents? Out? For the weekend right? Bro told me. We should spent it getting to know each other. Now, bow down." Josh was constantly keeping me off-guard. I bowed to him. Gently replying "Yes. bu-" "Good. Lower, still in the way. Boy." So I lowered myself further. My face more directly in front of his right foot, which was on top of his left."

He left me in silence for the remainder of the foot rub. Even in the awkward position I was in, once I let myself forget it was Josh's foot I was rubbing I managed to relax. Josh hadn't gave me any room to think. I still needed to protest him staying for the weekend. It would be a like a personal hell.

You awake to the feeling of your mobile phone alarm clock vibrating on your face. You have always been a heavy sleeper, so it put you in quite a problematic situation, when Josh told you how he expected to be woken up by you.

Of course, he decided to take your bed. 'Thanks for letting me sleep in your bed, Stevie. I know the floor is hard and uncomfortable, so I really appreciate it.' You didn't push back. 'I know you would have offered me anyway, because you want me to understand how much you respect me, right?'. He loved playing this charade of bossing you around, taking your stuff, making you do demeaning things, and all the while acting like you were just two guys hanging out together. 'Yes, Josh...' He wasn't surprised by your answer, just took it as the way it was supposed to be. That was on Friday night, while he ate the dinner you prepared for him, and you were sitting on the floor at his feet listening to your growling stomach. At this point it was already more than obvious, that Josh could walk all over you and you would just take it. So he did. You slept on the floor next to your bed for two nights without fighting back, and on Sunday night Josh decided to push you even further than before. 'You know why you are sleeping on the floor buddy? I tell you why. That's because it's really important to you to have me know just how much you respect me, buddy. Because some guys are just better than other guys, and it's allright to face that fact. You know, Steven Hawking is better at thinking about physics-stuff than I am, and Jamie Oliver is better at cooking, and Usain Bolt is better at running really fast. Nothing wrong with admitting that. And although I'm two years younger than you, I already am just much, much better than you on every dimension imaginable, Stevie.' You didn't respond, because you just didn't know what to say.
So Josh went on. 'But that's O.K., we can still be buddies, as long as you face the facts, behave accordingly, and show me the respect I deserve. First of all, you should be thankful that I let you sleep in the same room as I and don't just, you know, have you sleep in the bathtub or something. That's pretty nice of me, right. Now, tomorrow is a Monday. I hate Mondays, dude, and therefore I like my Mondays to start of especially well. So I thought of a nice way for you to make that happen, and at the same time show just how much you respect me.' You didn't like where this was going at all. 'Tomorrow morning you will wake me up by kissing the bottoms of my feet. That's going to feel really nice for me, and it'll be a perfect expression of the respect you have for me, for being so much better than you.' 'But... come on Josh. Do I really have to...' you tried to interrupt, but he just cut you off. 'Shut up dude. It's silent time for you when I am speaking. I want to be woken up by the feeling of your lips being pressed nicely and obediently against the bottoms of my dirty feet. That's what's going to wake me up tomorrow, and I don't want to hear an alarmclock going of. No idea how you are going to accomplish that, but I don't really care, figure it out yourself. Now, I have decided that I'm going to lock up the room for the night, because I don't want you walking around the house. I just think we aren't good enough buddies yet for you to have that privilege. So this is your final chance to go potty. Hush, dude.'
It seems strange to think back to that situation now, but Josh had just established so much of his dominance over the course of the weekend, that you didn't even know how to deny these degrading orders. You rather felt relieved that it was only his feet, that he ordered you to kiss. Ashamed, you hung your head and walked to the bathroom as you were ordered, having Josh's chuckles in your ears only add to your humiliation. 'Hahahaha, you little twerp...'. When you were back in your room, he allowed you to take a blanket and a pillow to 'get comfy with', and you lay down right next to your bed. You took your phone out, turned on the alarm clock and set it to vibrate only. Then you put it on your forehead, so it would wake you up for sure, without making a lot of noise.
Josh locked the door and turned the light off. While walking from the door to your bed he took of his shirt, and just threw it around the room carelessly, before he stopped right next to where you were laying and looked down at you. 'How you feel, dude? Nice and comfy down there? Already looking forward to waking me up tomorrow?' You wanted to look away, but with your phone on your forehead you couldn't move without it falling down, so you had to look up at Josh standing there bare-chested, just grinning down at you. You felt unbelievably stupid. 'Sure dude, whatever...' You just wanted him to get in bed and finally leave you be for the night, but it didn't appear to be your choice.
'Yeah, of course you do, hahahaha... Look, I'm going to do you one last favour before going to sleep. So just close your eyes and wait for your surprise.' info.brief_description: Teen boy Steve gets dominated and humiliated by the younger brother of his best friend.
info.description:
Okay people, this story is going to be primarily a Male on male story. The focus is not on sex (although it is explicitly not taboo), but on scenarios about various forms of domination and humiliation, at the moment mainly involving Steve being beaten up, verbally dominated and foot-dominated. (Other things I have in mind right now include foot smelling, kissing, licking, body or muscle worship, facesitting, ass and crotch kissing, pissing, faceslapping, beatings, wrestling and fighting domination, use as sparring dummy, punishment lectures and verbal humiliation, bondage or objectification, to name just a few.)

I'd be glad to see you contribute to the story with the existing or with new characters (also females), but please don't delete any of the two main characters from the story or make them passive side characters for too long.
Also, if you want to contribute, please abstain from the following:
scat, severe injury, blood, girlification, sissification or diaper-play, shrinking or magic.

Apart from that do, what you want and try to keep it descriptive and alive (So please no one-liners, if possible).
(I added a lot of 'other' categories, because most of the time I'm only allowed to post two alternative paths at the ending of the chapter. Feel free to enter and write on especially the 'other' categories, but be sure always to create a new 'other' subcategory to ensure the possibility to developing the story in different ways.)

Bytheway, If you have ideas about how you would want the story to progress or what you would like to see happen in general, about what kinds of characters you would like to see introduced or about specific things being done or said, then please don't hesitate to PM and tell me. I'm not judgmental and always curious for input. So if you don't feel like writing yourself and your idea tickles me enough, I might just do it for you :).

FINAL DISCLAIMER:
I'm writing about this stuff because it pushes my sexual buttons, NOT because I am advocating people should give in to their dark and destructive impulses and endorse them as a foundation for how to live their life on a daily basis. Kink responsibly, distinguish playtime from reality.

This being said, I hope this story may appeal to some of your dark sides, and that you enjoy reading, reviewing and writing it.
(And if you do, feel free to check my tumblr-blog where I might post from time to time - https://www.tumblr.com/blog/redhead3710 )
